title: A proclamation anent the mint, and declaring Spanish ryals current, at fifty six shilling Scots
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty,
notes: Dated at end: Edinburgh the fourth day of July, 1683. and of Our Reign the 35th year.
Arms 234; Steele notation: France, several Our.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
